Feature: Comparisons often made between different ethnic groups, with one group more likely to yell.
Male characters, across various ethnicities, are shown as more controlled or rational in stressful situations.
Caucasian or non-minority characters are often depicted as calm in contrast to characters of color.
Latina characters are also depicted with similar confrontational traits, often in comparison with African American women.
African American women often portrayed as yelling or showing anger.
